description:
A transfer student named Maito comes to Hibiki and Kotone`s class. He`s handsome, smart, good at sports, and generally perfect all around. But when Maito joins them for a trip to a local museum, they run into trouble from Mink and Tank... and the powerful dancer, Choreo, who challenges them to a "Dance Brave"!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 強敵現る! ダンスブレイブ!!
